original_text: On the east there were six each day, on the north four each day, on the south four each day, as well as two and two at the gatehouse.
korean_text: 동쪽 문에 레위 사람이 여섯이요 북쪽 문에 매일 네 사람이요 남쪽 문에 매일 네 사람이요 곳간에는 둘씩이며

sentences.original_text: On the east there were six each day
on the north four each day
on the south four each day
as well as two and two at the gatehouse
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 문간에는 두 명씩 두 조가 있었습니다.
